title: Roof Top Photovoltaic (RTPV) System - means any of the two Photovoltaic Systems installed on the roof of any building, i
clause_text: Roof Top Photovoltaic (RTPV) System - means any of the two Photovoltaic Systems installed on the roof of any building, i.e. (i) RTPV System with storage facility using battery, and (ii) Grid Connected RTPV System.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
